name: The Great Gatsby
description: F. Scott Fitzgerald captures the glittering yet tragic decadence of the Roaring Twenties, as mysterious millionaire Jay Gatsby pursues the American Dream and lost love in a world built on illusion.

name: The Story of My Life
alt: Cover of the story of my life by Helen Keller

description: George Orwell’s dystopian masterpiece depicts a totalitarian regime led by Big Brother—exploring surveillance, propaganda, and the erasure of truth in a chilling vision of oppressive society.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
alt: Cover of To Kill a Mockingbird
description: Harper Lee’s classic novel explores racial injustice through the eyes of young Scout Finch in the Deep South, blending a coming-of-age story with sharp critique of social prejudice and moral courage.
